TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientWindowsAuthenticationMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 以用戶端應用程式服務啟用 Windows 驗證。

span.span: Enables Windows authentication with client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用用戶端應用程式服務來驗證使用者使用 Windows 驗證。You can use client application services to validate users by using Windows authentication. 若要啟用 Windows 驗證，您可以設定應用程式使用類別。To enable Windows authentication, you configure your application to use the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：設定用戶端應用程式服務](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](~/docs/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services.md). 設定之後，您可以驗證使用者，藉由呼叫`static`方法。After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` method. 方法會在內部呼叫方法。The method internally calls the method. 方法便會自動驗證目前的使用者，並設定`static`屬性物件，其中包含目前。The method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 如果設定您的應用程式，您可以使用角色服務從擷取的使用者角色資訊的物件。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. 您可以擷取目前的參考透過執行個體`static`屬性。You can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the `static` property. 您可以使用成員資格提供者參考呼叫直接的方法。You can use the membership provider reference to call the method directly. 此外，您將需要的成員資格提供者參考呼叫方法，就無法用於基底類別。Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the method, which is not available in the base class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來使用 Windows 驗證來驗證使用者。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication. 在此範例中，值`static`屬性轉換成執行個體。In this example, the value of the `static` property is cast to a instance. 這樣可確保若您不慎使用另一個成員資格提供者測試這段程式碼將會擲回。This makes sure that a will be thrown if you accidentally test this code by using another membership provider. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#309)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#309)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 驗證會使用使用者登入的電腦或網域時，由作業系統所提供的身分識別。Windows authentication uses the identity supplied by the operating system when a user logs on to the computer or domain. 因此，這個類別無關使用者認證與相關的屬性。Therefore, properties related to user credentials are not relevant for this class.

summary.span: 登出使用者。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過用戶端應用程式服務，進行驗證的使用者`static`屬性設定為物件，可讓您設定的角色服務的存取。For users authenticated through client application services, the `static` property is set to a object that enables access to the configured role service. 方法重設屬性物件，其中包含目前。The method resets the property to a object that contains the current . 呼叫這個方法之後，您就無法再擷取透過使用者角色類別。After you call this method, you can no longer retrieve roles for the user through the class. 若要重新驗證目前的使用者，呼叫方法。To reauthenticate the current user, call the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來登出使用者。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#310](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#310)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#310](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#310)]

summary.span: 使用作業系統所提供的識別自動驗證目前使用者。

span.span: Automatically authenticates the current user by using the identity supplied by the operating system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定應用程式使用類別`static`方法會使用它的實作此方法。When you configure your application to use the class, the `static` method will use this method for its implementation. 方法便會自動驗證目前的使用者，並設定`static`屬性物件，其中包含目前。The method automatically authenticates the current user and sets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 如果設定您的應用程式，您可以使用角色服務從擷取的使用者角色資訊的物件。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法來使用 Windows 驗證來驗證使用者。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to authenticate a user by using Windows authentication. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#309)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#309](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#309)]
